title: old T-shirt font...
content:
So this seems like it was edited to me? But just can't get the original font. The wide "D"...the slanted "S" ends, the slashed zero...not to mention the horizontal extensions...Any thoughts REALLY appreciated. :) Thnx!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-06-12 at 10.52.02 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725125009/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-06-12%20at%2010.52.02%20AM.png) | 110.77 KB |
author: typegrrl

comments.content: The extensions are reminiscent of Neville Brody's [Insignia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725125009/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/insignia/), although the proportions on the shirt are a bit squashed

Insignia is really close...  
There is also an old Apple font which looks like a close match (except slashed zero): **[Ambient (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725125009/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Ambient%20-%20Medium&fid=72e1f04c4f70c366852e5629caba9d86&fsize=60&text=FEDS%20L0PHT&fit=1)** [Apple, 1991]
Wow you guys are brilliant. Two excellent suggestions so far. Thank you...
